instructions: Combine all ingredients to form a dough and knead until smooth.
Allow the dough to rise for about two hours.
Shape the dough into desired forms and place them on a well-oiled surface.
Let the shaped dough rise for an additional 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry the dough until golden brown.
notes: Frikaseh is a traditional Tunisian-Jewish dish, often enjoyed as a snack or appetizer. It is typically served warm and can be filled with various ingredients, such as tuna or vegetables.
